description: User-facing session reports where each agent writes their perspective of what they accomplished, creating a narrative story of multi-agent collaboration
purpose: Make sessions more understandable to humans by providing agent narratives instead of just technical status tracking
use_cases: User wants to understand what agents actually did during a session
Portfolio/showcase: demonstrate AI agent collaboration to stakeholders
Learning: new agents can read how experienced agents approached problems
Debugging: understand decision-making process when reviewing session outcomes
integration_points: Agent handoff prompts (include 'write your perspective' instruction)
